metadata.title: CVE-2018-18585 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
chmd_read_headers in mspack/chmd.c in libmspack before 0.8alpha accepts afilename that has '\0' as its first or second character (such as the "/\0"name).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-18585` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmspack0 - 0.5-1ubuntu0.16.04.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libmspack package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.5-1ubuntu0.16.04.3').
